website_summaries.verdict: Designed for those who want ear plugs in a pretty pink color, these block out most sleep disturbing sounds.
pros: Polyurethane foam plugs block out snoring, talking, music, and outside noise
Also good for live music events or fireworks shows
cons: They may not block loud snoring effectively

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Solution!
customer_reviews.text: I never would have thought that there was a solution for my husband’s extra-loud snoring or the loud volume of the tv when I am trying to sleep. These are the answer! Very easy to insert, and they really work! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: E. Kirch

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my girlfriend and she loves them. I used them myself when I first received the product. I like the fact that it mutes the surrounding sounds, but can still partially make out some on the sounds around me. Since my girlfriend has a hard time sleeping during the day, works night shift, the weekly cutting of the grass in our apartment complex added to her inability to have a proper rest. These ear plugs have been a blessing.
customer_reviews.author: S. Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Even on your side they don't feel like anything in your ear
customer_reviews.text: They are so soft you can't tell you are wearing them while sleeping. Even on your side they don't feel like anything in your ear. Works great sleeping with a snoring husband.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These really muffle out ALL noise! Great for women's ears too!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a very light sleeper and I LOVE these so much that I bought the 100-pack after trying out their smaller size packs based off their good reviews. Besides the fact that they're fantastically pink, they work well for me on those nights when I'm having a hard time sleeping due to either city noise/husbands snoring. I also think it's important to note that these didn't cause me ear pain from wearing them, apparently women have smaller ear canals then men, so these are specifically formulated for smaller ears. I know you're not supposed to re-use ear plugs, but I can usually get almost a weeks worth use out of one pair.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because my neighbors play loud music and even sing loudly sometimes. I’ve never purchased ear plugs before and was worried about them not fitting since I’ve been told I have small ear canals. But they do fit. And they definitely do the job. I can sleep more peacefully. They also stay in my ears for the most part. I have perfect hearing in one ear and can only hear 10-15% out of my other ear. But I still use both.
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe it but THESE WORK!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe they worked! My boyfriend has sleep apena and refuses to wear a mask. His snoring is so loud and I was depressed about having to leave the bed every night. Well, with these earplugs we are sleeping in the same bed. Must be what they are made of because they work so well. I've tried many, many different brands and types. These are the only ones that have worked. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product has changed
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these earplugs for over a year, when I ordered a new batch they were very different and seemed to be very cheaply made. They didn't used to have tiny holes in them, they used to be a darker color (these are very light pink), and they used to be cut perfectly, these have small pieces of foam that were incorrectly cut sticking out of them which isn't something you want to put in your ear. I don't know if these are just really really old, or if the product has changed.
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Completely different
customer_reviews.text: Completely different compared to what I’ve bought in the past. The ones on the left are the old ones and the ones on the right are the new ones. They feel different, don’t work nearly as well and they have an extremely fishy smell. I don’t know if this is a bad batch or what but I will be returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product has changed; poor quality recently
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this brand for years, & I’m going to return the latest batch. They don’t stay compressed AT ALL so you can’t insert them fully into your ears. I still have a few pairs from my last box & the comparison is like night & day. The foam on the new ones seems cheap & lightweight. The old ones have some heft to them.
customer_reviews.author: elba827

customer_reviews.title: Soft and muffles the sound well
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for 10 years, I am a very light sleeper. It muffles the sound well enough. After about 2-3 weeks of use they absorb your ears’ secretions etc so it’s hard to squeeze them and place back in the ear and your ear iches- so it’s the time to change the pair. It doesn’t hurt the ears, also I’ve never had ear infections with them and so we clear- it won’t block sound 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not cancel out snoring
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, these did not work for me. My husband's snoring still woke me up even though I followed the instructions on how to insert these earplugs into my ear. The ear plugs were also very uncomfortable once they had expanded in my ear canal. My ears were sore in the morning. I did see how these cancel out softer noises, such as the ceiling fan in our bedroom. This noise however doesn't bother me, in fact it is good white noise so this noise didn't need cancelling out.
customer_reviews.author: mscandypants

customer_reviews.title: Great earplugs
customer_reviews.text: These are the best earplugs for small ear canals. Even though I am a male, my ear canals are small and I wear these pink earplugs. They fit well and block out bothersome noises. These earplugs are the classic Hearos earplugs and not the Heroes pink successor with the same name which are larger and cause me to have ear pain.
customer_reviews.author: bryan05

customer_reviews.title: Excellent earplugs if you have small ears/ narrow ear canal
customer_reviews.text: Best earplugs I have used. I sleep with earplugs every night, and these are small enough to be comfortable but big enough not to fall out. I often get told I have small ears, and I guess it might be true because normal earplugs feel too big. Other brands are too fat and give me earaches or too stiff and fall out whenever I roll over. For once, it's worth it to pay the "pink tax."
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Ray

customer_reviews.title: Works for Lawn  Mower Snoring
customer_reviews.text: I love this it blocks sound perfectly. I got for someone who snores like a lawn mower or construction equipment going. I recommend before you go to sleep to practice fitting these in your ears.
customer_reviews.author: Amaya

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stays put
customer_reviews.text: Best ear plugs I've tried! Others are too dense and hard to get to stay in overnight, but these are soft and comfortable and stay put! Also block out small noses through the night that would otherwise interrupt my sleep (husband snoring, dog whining before falling asleep, etc), yet I can hear my alarm in the morning and my son if he calls for me.
customer_reviews.author: vickivet

customer_reviews.title: Do not block out snoring, or any sounds that well
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe these are touted as snore-blockers. Not only is that completely untrue but they are also pretty bad at blocking out any sound. They are comfortable but that is about the only positive thing I can say about them.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Lewis-Balog

customer_reviews.title: These ear plugs are great! I love my boyfriend
customer_reviews.text: These ear plugs are great! I love my boyfriend, but not his snoring. I normally use the regular noise cancelling ear plugs from the drug store. These actually work a little better. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work very well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and another set of ear plugs. This one hardly blocks any noise. I would recommend the other ear plugs I bought, here is the link.
customer_reviews.author: Jam

customer_reviews.title: Im amazed
customer_reviews.text: I've never used earplugs in my life but my boyfriend is a snorer when he lands on his back so I had to try something. I LOVE these! They're SO soft its unreal so they feel extremely comfortable in my ears all night. They do a great job of blocking out sound! Very easy to put in and I can honestly say my sleep has improved without a doubt. Can't recommend these ear plugs enough.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Blocks almost all noise
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Blocks almost all noise! W these can't hear the lawn mowers or tractors outside while I try sleeping during the day as I am a night shifter!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda R.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product after reading several ratings and thought these earplugs may work to help drown out sounds such as snoring, and loud tv sounds from next door neighbor, as well as blocking sounds from other people's earplugs (who are listening with their earphones; playing their music that I shouldn't have to hear), when I'm commuting via public transportation. These earplugs did absolutely nothing for me!
customer_reviews.author: jazz24/7

customer_reviews.title: Not the same
customer_reviews.text: These seem different than the same brand in a smaller box (which I bought at retail). These ones don’t compress as well and don’t stay in my ear. I found the slim fit from a different brand work better for me now, but I am discouraged I have so many left of this one :(
customer_reviews.author: Customer11111

customer_reviews.title: Very little noise cancelling
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I am very disappointed. I’ve read many reviews and decided to buy them since I’m a light sleeper and my boyfriend snores (not too loud tho). I was so excited and even more disappointed when found out they do not block noise at all. I could hear every sound, including finger snaps, not to mention the snoring. 😕
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are the best earplugs I have ever used. They are comfortable & do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Win J

customer_reviews.title: What Misophonia?
customer_reviews.text: These are the best for my retarded ears, Misophonia, light sleeper....they stay in a long time and don't hurt my ear canals. YAY!
customer_reviews.author: Oz

customer_reviews.title: They don't work at all.
customer_reviews.text: These are great if you just want to give the illusion of wearing earplugs but still want to me able to hear everything. I've tried several earplugs and these are by far the worst I've used. Not only can i still hear everything, but they make my ears sore.
customer_reviews.author: BlossomTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: The best earplugs for sleeping!
customer_reviews.text: I literally wear these every day for my naps and nightly sleep. I have them in every travel bag and Have traveled the world with me. Little pink earplugs everywhere bc I cannot sleep without them! Truly. These fit perfectly, block out hubby’s snoring and don’t hurt my ears. The pink Hearos eye mask was THE BEST! Wish that was still available!
customer_reviews.author: LakeLover

customer_reviews.title: but these are perfect. They stay put all night
customer_reviews.text: These are the only earplugs I’ll wear, and I’ve tried many! My ears must be on the smaller side because most earplugs hurt my ears or, but these are perfect. They stay put all night.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife needs these to drown out my snoring. Without them, there would be no sleep in our house
customer_reviews.author: Mikebandw186

customer_reviews.title: They work really good if you can get them in right
customer_reviews.text: They work really good if you can get them in right. I have a problem almost every night. It takes me 5-10 minutes to get them in. But again, once you have them in correctly they are great. Don'e hear my husband snore at all. lol
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: No longer comfortable - they’ve changed the design
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using these for years. My ear lobes are very small and these earplugs are the only ones that were actually small enough to provide all night comfort... until now. When I received my latest shipment the plugs looked and felt noticeably different. They barely fit in my ears and they HURT. Please go back to the old style!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Overholt

customer_reviews.title: Best ear plugs I've used.
customer_reviews.text: I'm an exceptionally light sleeper with very noisy family, and I have a hard time falling back to sleep once wakened, so these have made it possible for me to get a decent night's sleep. Good quality, rarely fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Groundhog

customer_reviews.title: Poor job
customer_reviews.text: Not nearly as good as others. Harder to roll to expel air from plug to insert in ear. So when I put it in canal it is already expanded and doesn’t expand and seal to block noise. Much less porous. I’ll switch to non-disposable.
customer_reviews.author: MagnusDunning

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I like them. Nice and soft, and they don't stab my eardrum. I have little ear canals and these are much more comfortable than the ones I've been using for the last couple of years. They also make it quieter than the white ones did.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Work great. No ear pain.
customer_reviews.text: You will sleep like a baby. Still a little bigger than I'd like, but block sound better than the smaller Mack's brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Product has changed - do not work
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased these earplugs twice. The material that the earplugs are made out of has changed from the original purchase. With the new material I find it very difficult to get these positioned in my ear canal. Very disappointed as the original ones worked great. Sad!
customer_reviews.author: BL

customer_reviews.title: These are fakes!
customer_reviews.text: They came in a zip lock back over stuffed in the Sleep Pretty box. They are a brighter pink and have weird spring back vs the originals. Do not buy, these are not the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: carla chitwood

customer_reviews.title: Muffled Snores
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. I can still hear things but it is very muffled and once I am asleep it does not bother me. For those who have a snorer in their bed, I suggest trying to go to bed earlier than them, because then the effectiveness works better. Pretty comfortable, hurts my ears if I wear them for many days in a row, but I don't think you are really supposed to. I like the color because they are easy to find if you drop once. Great Product overall.
customer_reviews.author: LolaB

customer_reviews.title: favorite ear plugs so far
customer_reviews.text: great at keeping out sound and comfortable, the bright pink color makes them easy to find amongst the covers
customer_reviews.author: B. Gormley

customer_reviews.title: Saved my relationship
customer_reviews.text: I literally couldn’t stand sleeping next to my snoring partner until I purchased these bad boys and will never buy another brand. These are just so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Adams

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Sufficiently Block Noise
customer_reviews.text: I use ear plugs so I can sleep at night. I bought these because regular foam earplugs make my ears itch. I found these hypoallergenic ones and thought I'd give them a try. These are very difficult to insert because they do not compress enough to fit in the war canal. The couple of times I was able to insert them, they did not block noise as well as the regular foam plugs. I do not recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and practical
customer_reviews.text: These are soft enough that I often sleep with them in. They don't fully block out noise, but muffle it enough for me to sleep without problem. That means they are also useful to me in loud situations.. I can wear them but still understand people talking loudly or hear my name called if someone's trying to get my attention. Only downside is the pink color makes it very obvious when I'm wearing them, so I can't sneak them in to ignore relatives. :)
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: ) Comfortable and no sore ears in the morning
customer_reviews.text: These work! Sleep through the night first time in weeks! Didn’t have to elbow my husband once to turn over :) Comfortable and no sore ears in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and silence
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable for sleeping. They are a bit smaller than typical earplugs, so they create less pressure on my ear canal, but still block out noise excellently. After trying numerous different brands and styles of earplugs over the years, these are by far my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with these fake Hearos
customer_reviews.text: Just like some other reviewers, I got a batch that is completely different from the same style that I have bought in the past regarding color, feel, and has a strong fishy smell. Returning promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Most of the Drug Stores have stopped selling these
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this brand which cuts out the street noise and the neighbor's air conditioner noise.
customer_reviews.author: Rev. LeRoy Cressy

customer_reviews.title: Great for small ears.
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite earplugs. I have very, very small ears and these fit. They block sound very well, too!
customer_reviews.author: BuddhaGeek

customer_reviews.title: Too big for my ears
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because a website I visited recommend them for small ears... Whelp these are still too big for me. They start off comfortable but within 30 minutes I'm ready to rip them out of my ears because of the discomfort. Sucks I bought a big bag of them. I'll just have to pass these along to someone else.
customer_reviews.author: A'Veryell M.

customer_reviews.title: fell out in my sleep
customer_reviews.text: did not block snoring at all, could still hear a loud snore with these in. Fell out in my sleep a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expand way too fast
customer_reviews.text: These are soft yes, but they regain their shape way too fast!! I roll them up to put them in and can’t get them into my ear fast enough before they regain their shape. I’ve gotten a few to stay put and they are nice to wear once they are in but I’ve had to throw out most of them before even using them.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Whitman

customer_reviews.title: the best. Comfortable to sleep in
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other earplugs on here, and these are, by far, the best. Comfortable to sleep in, block out all noise - love them.
customer_reviews.author: Fitness fanatic

customer_reviews.title: I always have these on hand!
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't travel without these. I have tried many kinds of earplugs - these are my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Pond Lady

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sleep
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for sleep. Probably not strong enough for intense noise though.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: These things are a lifesaver!! I have smaller ear canals and can’t wear most ear plugs that they sell in stores, they hurt my ears after a while but these I can wear all night long with hardly any issue!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Hurt when sleeping and ineffective
customer_reviews.text: I used these for a trip. They did stay in my ears, but hurt when sleeping and didn't eliminate noise.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These work well for noise cancelling and settle comfortably in my ears.
customer_reviews.author: knitterdame

customer_reviews.title: My favorite brand!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite ear plugs, soft and work beautifully. Great buy in this larger quantity.
customer_reviews.author: AML

customer_reviews.title: Finally some peace and quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Work sooooo great! So soft in the ears. I can sleep with them in. Blocks a good amount of background noise.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.  Does not work
customer_reviews.text: These do not work. Will not stay in my ears.
customer_reviews.author: frankie

customer_reviews.title: Beware big ears - don't fill the ear hole well.
customer_reviews.text: I have big ears (big guy) and these don't fill the ear hole very well.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Fleener

customer_reviews.title: Not for tiny ears!
customer_reviews.text: These were too big for my ears. I do have very small ears - but these gave me headaches.
customer_reviews.author: MJP

customer_reviews.title: They do not work
customer_reviews.text: They expand too fast to properly get them to fit into the canal. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Plunkett

customer_reviews.title: They may fall out if you roll around while sleeping but work pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: They work for blocking out noise when sleeping. They may fall out if you roll around while sleeping but work pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Ilka Perreira

customer_reviews.title: Great noise control.
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Very comfortable and not so big that you end up with giant ear holes after using them.
customer_reviews.author: Jbinjamul

customer_reviews.title: The Best and I’ve Tried Them All!
customer_reviews.text: Best earplugs and I’ve tried them all! Soft, comfortable, but snug fitting and don’t fall out. My husband snores horrible, but I don’t hear anything when I wear these. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Cottrell

customer_reviews.title: Its Ok, But Good For All Night Rest
customer_reviews.text: This product does drown out noise and does fit in the ear. However, overnight use is not recommended as it may fall out of ear as you toss and turn. Also, your ear canal may feel sore after a few days of consistent use.
customer_reviews.author: Rivera, Judee

customer_reviews.title: Light sleepers need these.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to tune out the stupid garage door sound. It works fine👌
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great for sleeping!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend snores at about 70-80 dB, about the level of having a vacuum cleaner running next to your head while you’re sleeping. I had pretty low expectations for these earplugs, but I was very impressed. They are soft and perfect for small ears and ear canals like mine. They fit well with minimum pressure, so I’ve slept on my side for the past couple of days with no problem. I can still hear snoring, but now it’s much more like a cute rumble than a vacuum cleaner sucking up legos. My only caveat would be that you should make sure to read the instructions before you use them, or they might not be as effective.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Soft and block sounds
customer_reviews.text: These are the best ear plugs I've found in 30 years! They are very soft and are the only ones that don't hurt my ears throughout the night. I couldn't find them in a store anymore and was pleasantly surprised to find them on Amazon for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly J. Hunsaker

customer_reviews.title: Soft, great fit
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, very soft, and so many it takes a long time to lose them all lol
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Great product! They’re comfortable and they go in my ears easily. I really can’t sleep without them. I bought a box back in 2017 and I’m just now starting to run low.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are pretty soft and comfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty soft and comfortable to use. They are great canceling the noise and allow me to sleep through the night
customer_reviews.author: Joegalle

customer_reviews.title: What a waste of money!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband snores so because of the description of these I thought they would be perfect.. Boy, was I wrong. My husband was asleep in his recliner in the next room snoring so I put on the ear plugs. Did not block a sound. His snoring was just as bad with or without the ear plugs. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: H. Zeleniuk

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have very noisy upstairs neighbors. These have helped so much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hurts ears
customer_reviews.text: The earplugs definitely get rid of noise, but they hurt my ears after having them in less than 3 hours. So I can't really use them for what they intended for.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Soft Does not hurt
customer_reviews.text: Favorite. Doesn't hurt, soft. Not rated as thick/ high for very loud noises, but that makes it our favorite for sleeping!
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Favorite ear plugs ^.^
customer_reviews.text: Love using this to go to sleep! Feels super soft and blocks out the majority of noise around you! Can’t sleep without these
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I was just going to use them through open window season but love them so much I use them year round. I can't sleep without them now!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unable to Use
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the "narrow" Hearos due to my wife's small ear canal and my chronic snoring. They work to block the snoring but two or more days of use in a row and they wake my wife up in pain. No fault of the manufacturer, we believe - my wife does have REALLY small ears. If you're worried about that or you get infections due to the small size of your ears these may not work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Mumford

customer_reviews.title: Hearos Brand best @ blocking noise
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried other brands and they don’t block noise as well as Hearos
customer_reviews.author: SKrueger

customer_reviews.title: effective and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: these do an incredible job blocking out sound and are very comfortable on my small frame.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla M.

customer_reviews.title: They did not block snoring easy to return
customer_reviews.text: Did not work. They did not block snoring easy to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Allows for peaceful sleep
customer_reviews.text: These earplugs are comfortable and do a great job blocking out noise.
customer_reviews.author: Amelie

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Use these all the time and are perfect to keep noise down when sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: not for me
customer_reviews.text: Very bummed to say these don't stay in my ears very well. I'll keep trying to use them but so far no luck.
customer_reviews.author: Urban Girl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a marriage saver if you have a spouse who snores!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Durham

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: these are the best ear plugs on the market - soft, and effective
customer_reviews.author: aoife

customer_reviews.title: Great for snoring
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic earplugs that saved me from listening to snoring all night long!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle P.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. Blocks out NOTHING! Just meant to look prett
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They work really well. I can sleep next to my snoring boyfriend!
customer_reviews.author: C Darling

customer_reviews.title: Description is accurate
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping!! Product does exactly what the description says.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Excellent noise reduction for good sleep
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, very good noise reduction for sleeping, a must have for daily use and travel!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses these and they work great to cut out my snoring.❤
customer_reviews.author: Jack B.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: If you put them in correctly, they really block out noise. Works great for snoring husband!
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Awesome earpkugs
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable to sleep with and I can’t hear any traffic outside. Awesome. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl selvar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They were so comfortable and blocked out my husbands snoring!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product. Great Idea when you are at the ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Product. Great Idea when you are at the dentist!!!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fits well and very comfortable to wear in the night.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Not liking the size--it doesn't block out snoring
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable but they don't block my husband's snoring like I expected. A little disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Meg V

customer_reviews.title: My husband does snore and I have used ear plugs for several years and really like dead silence
customer_reviews.text: They work really well but my heart is beating so hard these nights it keeps me awake. Trying a white noise app. My husband does snore and I have used ear plugs for several years and really like dead silence. If my heart wasn’t too noisy(probably a hormone thing) I’d keep using them. I use one on my exposed ear and not for the one against the pillow. 🙂
customer_reviews.author: wren

product_meta.title: HEAROS Sleep Pretty in Pink Ear Plugs, with The Highest Snoring
product_meta.description:
Protect your hearing with a noise diet 

 Working in factories or on roadwork used to be the most common cause of hearing loss. Now the main cause is recreational noise such as loud clubs and music venues. Protect yourself from irreversible noise-related hearing loss with HEAROS Sleep Pretty in Pink Women's Ear Plugs. These attractive, easy to use plugs are the perfect solution to loud, prolonged noise such as lawn care, sports venues like bowling alleys and even your own bedroom. You can sleep peacefully and in comfort, even on your side, with our noise blocking ear plugs. 

 Comfortable and effective 

 HEAROS Ear Plugs are made of ultra soft, hypoallergenic polyurethane foam, making them safe for the most sensitive ears. Specially sized for the diminutive female ear, you're assured of reliable noise reduction without the pain of man-sized ear plugs. Simply compress the foam plugs between your fingertips and then insert in your ears. They slowly expand to fill the ear canal and block out distracting or harmful noise. Study in peace, enjoy a good book in your hectic household, or safely sharpen your shooting skills at the gun range. With NRR 33 being the highest grade for foam ear plugs, HEAROS NRR 32 Ear Plugs combine superior comfort and protection for your hearing. 

 Quality you can count on 

 HEAROS Ear Plugs are made using stringent manufacturing processes for your peace of mind. Carry them with confidence in your car, gym bag or even in your pocket, so you can protect your hearing health wherever you go. With Amazon's 30-Day Money-Back Guarantee, you are assured that your satisfaction is our highest priority. 

 Have a sound plan to protect your hearing. Add HEAROS Sleep Pretty in Pink 100-Pair Ear Plugs to your cart today.
feature_bullets: PETITE SIZED for the smaller ear canals of women, these polyurethane foam plugs reduce noise from snoring spouses, inconsiderate dorm mates and loud environments like firing ranges and rock concerts.

NOISE REDUCTION RATING of 32 NRR protects your hearing and lets you read or work in peace. Ideal for air travel, studying, police and law enforcement. HEAROS Ear Plugs are the safe, natural sleep aid.
RELIABLE, COMFORTABLE FIT - with slow expanding foam. Conforms to your ear canal to block exposure to persistent, loud noises from traffic, industrial machinery, sports and outdoors.

SILKY SMOOTH FIT - with hypoallergenic, tapered formulation. Carry them discreetly in your purse, briefcase or carry-on luggage for use anytime, anywhere. Neon pink color makes them a stylish accessory.

QUALITY YOU CAN DEPEND ON - made under rigorous quality control protocols for noise reduction you can rely on. These must-have travel accessories strike an uncompromising balance between performance and comfort.
